posts.post_content:
Posted By: David G
I have 117 T206 duplicates that I would like to trade for other T206, T207 or C46.  My cards are almost all VG or lower.  As this is too many cards to list here please e-mail if you would like a list or need specific cards.  I have both my want list and dup list in excel files.

I only need 155 more T206 to finish the Monster and would like to complete it this year, thanks for your help!
